name: Sometimes the Monster is Unavoidable
description:
Player is represented by the number 9. 0 is empty space. 8 is a monster. 7 is an NPC.  Arrow buttons on screen move the player around. Press Z while next to an NPC to talk to it. You cannot talk to people while directly on top of them, because that is rude.

The screen flashes, so don't hurt yourself. Not sure if it requires an epilepsy warning because its pretty slow, but also its definitely hard to look at sometimes
